markdownRemark.html:
I purchased some Yubikeys a few weeks back, mostly for the convenience factor of pushing a button to sign into different web services securely. Anyway, one of the other cool things a Yubikey can do is house a PGP key. You can then use this PGP key to digitally sign code commits, emails, files, anything really.

This is how I set up easy PGP signature generation for my blog posts.

frontmatter.title: Privacy and Security Series, Part I: Password Managers
